title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama project: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models with a simple API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Bun, and modern browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM or chat backend.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (renamed to Open WebUI); chat, PDF, RAG, multimodal, admin panel.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent API, streaming, and embedding support.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based CLI that wraps Ollama with extra helpers for prompts, templates, and batch jobs.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Lightweight GitHub Copilot-style VS Code extension backed by Ollama models.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Ready-to-run RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + LangChain.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama model responses into any channel.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama-nvidia
summary: Official docs and container tags for running Ollama with NVIDIA GPUs.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with streaming chat, embeddings, and tool support.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that caches and serves Ollama models inside CI pipelines.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot built with Bolt JS that queries local Ollama models and threads responses.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds an Ollama sidebar for Q&A and note summarization.

title: ollama-rails
summary: Ruby gem wrapping Ollama for Rails apps; supports chat, completions, and embeddings.

title: ollama-model-library
summary: Community-curated collection of custom Modelfiles for niche domains (finance, medicine, RPG).
